enWisdom: Prayer is the better of the two means of [attaining] nearness [to Allah]
Prayer is the fortress of the all-Merciful and the instrument for expelling Satan
Prayer is a fortress [that protects] from the influences of Satan

Wisdom: إِذَا قَامَ أَحَدُكُمْ إِلَى الصَّلَاةِ فَلْيُصَلِّ صَلَاةَ مُوَدِّعٍ
enWisdom: When one of you stands to perform prayer, then let him pray the prayer of one who is bidding farewell [iehe should assume that it is the last prayer he will perform in his lifetime]

Wisdom: عَلِّمُوا صِبْيَانَكُمُ الصَّلَاةَ وَخُذُوهُمْ بِهَا إِذَا بَلَغُوا الْحُلُمَ
enWisdom: Teach your young children [how to perform the ritual] prayer and make them accountable for it when they reach puberty

Wisdom: كَمْ مِنْ قَائِمٍ لَيْسَ لَهُ مِنْ قِيَامِهِ إِلَّا الْعَنَاءُ
enWisdom: How many of those who stand [to perform prayer] have nothing in their prayer but [physical] effort

Wisdom: لَوْ يَعْلَمُ الْمُصَلِّي مَا يَغْشَاهُ مِنَ الرَّحْمَةِ لَمَا رَفَعَ رَأْسَهُ مِنَ السُّجُودِ
enWisdom: If the one who offers prayer knew how much divine mercy is descending upon him, he would surely not raise his head from prostration

Wisdom: مَا أَهَمَّنِي ذَنْبٌ أُمْهِلْتُ [أُهْمِلْتُ‏] فِيهِ حَتَّى أُصَلِّيَ رَكْعَتَيْنِ
enWisdom: I am not worried by a wrongdoing in which I am given time so that I can offer two units of prayer [and seek forgiveness]

Wisdom: لَا تَقْضِ نَافِلَةً فِي وَقْتِ فَرِيضَةٍ ابْدَأْ بِالْفَرِيضَةِ ثُمَّ صَلِّ مَا بَدَا لَكَ
enWisdom: Do not perform a recommended act at the time of an obligatory one; start with the obligatory [prayer] and then pray whatever more you wish to
